items.sentence: Tom says he wants to become a simultaneous interpreter.
I was quite thirsty and wanted to drink something cool.
Why are we attracted to some people, but not to others?
Are you implying that you don't want to see me anymore?
Turn on the light, please. I can't see anything at all.
I don't think we'll find anyone who'll do that for you.
I think we can find someone willing to do that for you.
I left Boston three years ago and I've never been back.
I think you should let Tom and me do that by ourselves.
Tom looked into Mary's eyes, leaned in, and kissed her.
